titleInfo.title: East Denver High School Class of 1907

physicalDescription.extent: 1 item (photograph), 8 x 10 inches, black and white
physicalDescription.note: Printed on the front of the photograph: ''E.D.H.S. Class of 1907, photo by CL McClure.'' Handwritten in pencil on the front of the photograph: ''6 from rt.'' and an arrow pointing to a circle around a male student in the sixth row. In the right front corner is handwritten ''Lewis Chernoff.'' Handwritten on the back of the photograph are names identifying the people in the photograph: ''Genevieve E. Perry, Irene Petersen, Chas. Hezmalhalah, Rowena E. McLennke, Bertha Werner, George F. Kimbrough, Earl Ellis, Baptiste Zimmermann, Earl Cree, Oscar M. Rachofsky, Arthur H. Laws, Claribel Kendall, Helen Allphin, Canton O'Donnell, Albert Bancroft, Clara P. Mohr, Florence Andrew, Anna E. Seais, Louise Allen, Edward Swift, Ruby V. Begg, Victor C. Moulton, Lula McFall, Walker M. Shaw, Florence Colby, Edna L. Reitze, Florntine Morning, Ralph S. Pitts, R. E. Quarly, Mary Stuart, Edah R. Chase, Helen T. Tuttle, Bertha Rachofsky, Jessie Hickenberger, Joe Hauly, Edna Paula Potter, Ailah Whittaker, Marie Allen, Helen Krajicek, Pearl E. Norfolk, Lettie Malinsten, Floretta Doty, Clarence Warthan, Winthrop E. Beausbard, Josephine Hepner, Fred T. Bryan, Nelle Traves, John McCarthy, Warner Mills, Isidor Rosenblum, Kast Shelton, Madeline A. Marshall, Charline A. Waters, Louise Rosenstock, Mary Miller, Arthur Zuatou, Carl McLauthlin, Carline Royal, Louise Higgins, Theodora MacAltioner, Beatrice Wozer, Earl Wettengel, William M. Parker, Harry C. Browne, Lansing Pearse, Wm. E. Dall, Gustave W. Vaelzel, Ortha B. Fielder, Otto Herres Jr., Rvd. P. Waner, Georgie Ruffe, Katherine Bartley, Peta R. Sweet, Frazer Bansko, Bertha Weiner, Rose Feldman, Florence Bruckman, Minnie Levy, Ethel M. Shoturll, Myrtle Knight, Thyrza Cohen, Jean Parker, Ida H. Quintin, Nellie P. Johnson, June Marie Barker, Charles Burnham, Walter C. Arundel, Jack Barrowsy, Marjorie B Sanway, John B. Garrie, Sam Cohen, Wm H. Smiley, Florance H. Scott, #735.''

mods.abstract: The East High School in Denver, Colorado, class of 1907, is shown sitting and standing in ten rows on the steps leading to the entrance of East High. The boys are attired in suits and the girls in skirts and blouses. Students in the photograph who are identified on the back are: Lewis Chernoff, Genevieve E. Perry, Irene Petersen, Chas. Hezmalhalah, Rowena E. McLennke, Bertha Werner, George F. Kimbrough, Earl Ellis, Baptiste Zimmermann, Earl Cree, Oscar M. Rachofsky, Arthur H. Laws, Claribel Kendall, Helen Allphin, Canton O'Donnell, Albert Bancroft, Clara P. Mohr, Florence Andrew, Anna E. Seais, Louise Allen, Edward Swift, Ruby V. Begg, Victor C. Moulton, Lula McFall, Walker M. Shaw, Florence Colby, Edna L. Reitze, Florntine Morning, Ralph S. Pitts, R. E. Quarly, Mary Stuart, Edah R. Chase, Helen T. Tuttle, Bertha Rachofsky, Jessie Hickenberger, Joe Hauly, Edna Paula Potter, Ailah Whittaker, Marie Allen, Helen Krajicek, Pearl E. Norfolk, Lettie Malinsten, Floretta Doty, Clarence Warthan, Winthrop E. Beausbard, Josephine Hepner, Fred T. Bryan, Nelle Traves, John McCarthy, Warner Mills, Isidor Rosenblum, Kast Shelton, Madeline A. Marshall, Charline A. Waters, Louise Rosenstock, Mary Miller, Arthur Zuatou, Carl McLauthlin, Carline Royal, Louise Higgins, Theodora MacAltioner, Beatrice Wozer, Earl Wettengel, William M. Parker, Harry C. Browne, Lansing Pearse, Wm. E. Dall, Gustave W. Vaelzel, Ortha B. Fielder, Otto Herres Jr., Rvd. P. Waner, Georgie Ruffe, Katherine Bartley, Peta R. Sweet, Frazer Bansko, Bertha Weiner, Rose Feldman, Florence Bruckman, Minnie Levy, Ethel M. Shoturll, Myrtle Knight, Thyrza Cohen, Jean Parker, Ida H. Quintin, Nellie P. Johnson, June Marie Barker, Charles Burnham, Walter C. Arundel, Jack Barrowsy, Marjorie B Sanway, John B. Garrie, Sam Cohen, Wm H. Smiley, and Florance H. Scott.
mods.note: The photograph was donated by Deborah Greenfield, the daughter of Lewis Chernoff, December 1984.
